attributes.action: Give consent for a Scottish Independence Referendum
attributes.additional_details: Scotland voted overwhelmingly to remain in the European Union. Against the will of its people it has been dragged out of the EU. A second referendum was indicated should circumstances have materially changed. - They have.
attributes.background: To allow a second Scottish Independence Referendum now that circumstances have materially changed.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Give consent to any request for a Scottish Independence Referendum
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572629
